title: Looking for a Demmitt Polar Bear
author: Moose117

posts.post_title: Looking for a Demmitt Polar Bear
posts.post_content:
Looking for a graded 1.
Please let me know what you've got!

have you seen this one?
I thought it was pretty nice for the grade.
[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/1910-T206-Ray-Demmitt-St-Louis-Polar-Bear-Factory-6-Back-PSA-1-Poor-Condition/142862350930?hash=item2143427a52:g:di4AAOSwwXZbRTnD[/url]

Hi Robert, I have what I believe to be a 1. Unfortunately, PSA thought that it was a PSA 3.5.   :confused:

Sorry, I guess this really isn't what you're looking for:


[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=322716&d=1531372945[/IMG]

If it's priced as a 1, I'm extremely interested!
